generator(adj, noun) → {string}

Generates random numbers for getAdj() and getNoun() functions and returns a new pizza name

Name Type Description
adj string String (adj)
noun string String (noun)

Logs the average amount of time per 10 frames needed to move the sliding background pizzas on scroll.

resizePizzas(size)

This function is called when the slider in the "Our Pizzas" section of the website moves. It changes the size of all pizzas on the page.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
size number
